resources.string:
"Developed By - McCauley Hallam

"
"Development Started - 09/03/2017

"
"Version - v0.1


"
"How to use this program...

"
"1. Start by choosing the course that you have taken, either Software or Hardware... Check the appropriate button and press continue.
" "2. On the next page, choose the grade that you have received for each unit. After you have finished ensure that all of the grades are correct, then you can press continue
" "3. This is the final page, here you should see your total score alongside the overall grade you have achieved.

" "That is everything you need to know, you're ready to try it out yourself!

"
"For more information, visit the following links...
" "https://www.ucas.com/
" "http://southdevon.ac.uk/university"
